nodes.text: Kejik was a Duros male sergeant who served the Galactic Republic and was working with of the Balmorran resistance during the Galactic War. He was annoyed by the Twi'lek named Natho, who claimed he could help Kejik with an assault on the Okara Droid Factory. Kejik refused to believe him until a fellow Republic citizen convinced him otherwise. Kejik then coordinated both Natho and the spacer in a mission to infect factory droids with a disruptive virus.
According to Star Wars: The Old Republic's conversation files, Kejik was originally named Forren.
